mods.abstract: One color window card (green on white ) announcing the Fannie Battle Carolers, a Nashville Christmas tradition since 1916. Donations to the Fannie Battle Carolers support a day care for children of low-income working parents. Poster features woodcuts of holly leaves and a candle in a window.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
